price: Kuma ba ku zama mãsu buwãya ba a cikin ƙasa kuma bã ku da wani majiɓinci, wanin Allah, kuma bã ku da wani mataimaki.
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
